author: donaldp
msg: Reorded addition of proeprties to environment when exec call has an additive environment so specified values overide values in the native environment.

author: donaldp
msg: Made sure that setting of environment variables for the native exec calls occurs accoridng to epectations.
If no properties are specified then null is passed to underlying exec call.
if some properties are set and environment is additive then the native environment is added to environment object

author: donaldp
msg: Make sure a property file with no properties in it does not cause any exceptions.

Made the Properties object returned from getNativeEnvironment() contain all environment properties rather than having the environment properties as default properties for property object. This allows much easier direct access to prpoerty values.

author: donaldp
msg: No need to implement resolveValue as TaskContext now supports that method directly.

author: donaldp
msg: Update implementation of TaskContext to support the new resolveValue method in TaskContext
